name: Chiello Pool Soccer
description:
Try now "Pool Soccer" it's free and you can play the new game of Pool billiard soccer themed.
Test the different game modalities, choose your best tactics, you can use 4 different modules, choose the your favorite shirt team and then sign your best record possible, and then see what position you have in the world ranking! don't give up plays and replays to beat all your opponents !

Two different game modality:
Hits: Put all the balls in the hole with as few strokes as possible.
Time: Put all the balls into the hole in the least possible time.
Team : choose the shirt colors of your favorite team and all the balls have the same color of your team.

Key Features:
Great Gameplay
Game Center enabled
Two game modes
Colorful graphics
Realistic sound effects
Realistic physic
Five different pool tables themes
Five different background music
Five differen football modules
Six different team
Local ScoreBoard

Pool soccer is the best pool game that you can find, it's free, fun and colorful!
So what aspects download it immediately and enjoy!

If you want give it a good grade, this will help us to produce more great games.
